posts.title: A full stadium for Charlie

twitter.content: The State Farm Stadium in Glendale, Arizona quickly filled up with people over an hour before Charlie Kirk's memorial began.

posts.author: awsure
posts.title: We got in. RIP Charlie. You will not be forgotten

posts.author: Mr_Rightside
posts.title: Reports that Charlie Kirk’s memorial at State Farm Stadium is “at capacity” are FALSE, TPUSA spokesman @AndrewKolvet confirms to me. If you’re in line, STAY IN LINE! THOUSANDS of seats are still open! Do not let the fake news media lie to you! They want open seats!

twitter.content:
🚨 ALERT: Reports that Charlie Kirk’s memorial at State Farm Stadium is “at capacity” are FALSE, TPUSA spokesman @AndrewKolvet confirms to me

If you’re in line, STAY IN LINE! THOUSANDS of seats are still open!

Do not let the fake news media lie to you! They want open seats!

posts.author: True-Patriot1776
posts.title: Miles of traffic - Stadium at capacity
